welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Stoneham, the charming city known for its picturesque scenery and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our beautiful city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for multiple airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights for multiple airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights for multiple airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: Handles international flights for multiple airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with free access for 30 minutes. Additional time can be purchased.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Hanscom Field Airport provides a luxurious and convenient experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport, serving all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lawrence Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boire Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boire Field Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
